sentences.sContent: The two Americans are unlikely pacesetters.
sentences.sCn: 这两个美国人看来不像领跑员。
哈蒙德曾是初期领跑员。

remMethod.val: pace(速度) + set(设置， 调整) + t + er (表人) → 步调调整者 → 领跑人

words.tran: [基医] 起搏器；领跑者；标兵

trans.tranOther: A pacesetter is someone who is in the lead during part of a race or competition and therefore decides the speed or standard of the race or competition for that time
